about_the_game:
Arise! The time for sleep has passed. The world needs you now, more than ever, as the threat of destruction looms closer with each passing moment.

The path of salvation lies ahead with only one way to attain it. You must conquer the dungeon and its keeper that awaits you.
Beware not to outstay your welcome as your life energy is slowly drained the longer you stay in the dungeon.

Those brave enough to venture the dungeon are rewarded with items to help power up their equipment, allowing them to reach further into its depths.

Complete quests, fight bosses, collect items and fish like your life depends on it!

Mastering this chaotic world will prove difficult as it transforms with each passing life.
Will you answer the call to save the world?


The demo includes some changes from the full version meant to better convey the charm of the game. Please note that your save data cannot be transferred to the full version.
detailed_description:
Arise! The time for sleep has passed. The world needs you now, more than ever, as the threat of destruction looms closer with each passing moment.

The path of salvation lies ahead with only one way to attain it. You must conquer the dungeon and its keeper that awaits you.
Beware not to outstay your welcome as your life energy is slowly drained the longer you stay in the dungeon.

Those brave enough to venture the dungeon are rewarded with items to help power up their equipment, allowing them to reach further into its depths.

Complete quests, fight bosses, collect items and fish like your life depends on it!

Mastering this chaotic world will prove difficult as it transforms with each passing life.
Will you answer the call to save the world?


The demo includes some changes from the full version meant to better convey the charm of the game. Please note that your save data cannot be transferred to the full version.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 11.2.3
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

name: Dungeon and Gravestone DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later x64
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz Dual Core or similar
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 500 series or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Steel yourself in the face of insurmountable opposition as you traverse this ever-changing world in a bid to save it from imminent desolation.
supported_languages: English, Polish, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese, French, Spanish - Latin America, Thai, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
